name: [B2B Integration Factory] - Order to Cash B2B Scenario - TRADACOMS

body.text:
STX=ANA:1+TP_TRADACOMS_ID:[Trading Partner Name]+Company_TRADACOMS_ID:[Company Name]+240422:142536+250++ORDHDR'
MHD=1+ORDHDR:9'
TYP=0430+NEW-ORDERS'
SDT=[Company Name]:11359++SAMPLECITY ONE:SAMPLE HOUSE:SAMPLE STREET:SampleCity:GU25 9BG'
CDT=TP_TRADACOMS_ID+[Trading Partner Name]+UK Home Office:Sample Lane:SampleCity:SampleCounty:WD25 8JS'
FIL=328+1+240422'
MTR=6'
MHD=2+ORDERS:9'
CLO=5055037201994:199+[Trading Partner Name]+Dummy Way:DummyVillage:DummyCounty:UK:NN1 5TZ'
ORD=1999011405::240422'
DIN=240508+240508++SPLIT OFF FROM PO 199-8913-215'
OLD=1+8710103968108::08710103968108++:502026+1+324+303000+++[Company Name]:L36/P108'
OTR=1'
MTR=7'
MHD=3+ORDTLR:9'
OFT=1'
MTR=3'
END=3'
